What People Say

Hear from colleagues and product users who have experienced the impact of these innovations in action.

Paul Jessop

Managing Director, Exon AI Ltd

Bolot is a complete technical team in one person. His work on the Automated Videoing Assistant (AVA) — recognised by Google and featured on BBC Click — was outstanding. He consistently delivers exceptional results with focus and determination.

Active Away

Company

We used to create match schedules manually for every game — team vs. team — and often made mistakes that required time-consuming corrections. Other existing solutions couldn’t generate the kind of match combinations we needed. Bolot Kalil uulu built a custom solution for us using machine learning, tailored exactly to our requirements. Now, with our application, the process takes just minutes — whereas before, it took days.

Aigul

Individual Entrepreneur

Now I can work without worrying about sudden power cuts — Agym keeps my business moving.

Mairambek

Livestock Owner

The Zhargylchak shredder saves me hours of manual work and reduces hay waste. I had previously purchased several Chinese-made models, but they all broke quickly. Zhargylchak, on the other hand, is built with high-quality, thick metal and precision-crafted parts. It shreds hay incredibly fast and works reliably day after day — it’s a machine I can truly depend on.
